channel.title: Super Donor Crown rights?
channel.description:
I've made a great Blue Super Donor Crown & I want to make it so everytime a donor talks, the blue crown will appear. (Much like with a moderator, for example).
The players rights for Super Donator is 5 so how do I make the Blue Crown appear with player rights 5.
This is a PI base. (Note: I'm asking this for a friend, I don't code PI. >.>)

item.title: Super Donor Crown rights?
